/*
   Author  : Captain C
   Date    : September 2002
   Purpose : WINMSG event processing for the EXAMPLES_UPDATES dialog.
   
   Comments
   ========
   
    This WINMSG event performs the following functions:
    
       1) Tracks the WM_MOUSEMOVE message sent to @window.  If the
          mouse moves over the www.revelation.com text label we
          change it's font to 'underline', returning it to normal
          when the mouse is out.
          
          Essentially we are duplicating hyperlink behaviour here!
          
      
   Amended   Date       Reason
   =======   ====       ======
   
*/
   $insert logical
   
   equ WM_SETCURSOR$       to 0x020
   equ WM_MOUSEMOVE$       to 0x200
   equ FONT_POS_UNDERLINE$ to 5
   
   begin case
      case ( message = WM_MOUSEMOVE$ )
         ctrlArray =        @window : ".TXT_WWW"
         propArray =        "SIZE"
         
         ctrlArray := @rm : @window : ".TXT_WWW"
         propArray := @rm : "FONT"
         
         dataArray =        get_Property( ctrlArray, propArray )
         
         wwwSize   =        dataArray[1,@rm]
         wwwFont   =        dataArray[col2()+1,@rm]
         
         * // Grab the coordinates of the mouse cursor - these
         * // are passed in lParam as 2 WORDs so we have to
         * // extract them like so:
         
         xPos = mod( lParam,65536 )
         yPos = int( lParam/65536 )
         
         * // Now find out if we're underneath the text control
         
         bUnderline = FALSE$
         
         if ( xPos >= wwwSize<1> ) then
            if ( yPos >= wwwSize<2> ) then
               if ( xPos <= ( wwwSize<1> + wwwSize<3> ) ) then
                  if ( yPos <= ( wwwSize<2> + wwwSize<4> ) ) then
                     bUnderLine = TRUE$
                  end
               end
            end
         end
         
         if ( wwwFont<0,0,FONT_POS_UNDERLINE$> # bUnderline ) then
            wwwFont<0,0,FONT_POS_UNDERLINE$> = bUnderline
            call set_property( @window : ".TXT_WWW", "FONT", wwwFont )
         end
      
   end case
   
RETURN 0
